sourcesContent:
import React, { createContext, useReducer } from 'react';


const initialState = {
    nav: {
        bg: '#F5F5F5',  // Neutral light gray (Primary - 70%)
        logoContainer: '#D9D9D9',  // Soft gray
        h1: '#3B3B3B',  // Dark neutral gray (Text)
        hamburger: '#3B3B3B',  // Matches text
        hamDiv: '#E0E0E0',  // Soft gray (Secondary - 20%)
        links: '#0078D4',  // Modern blue (Accent - 10%)
        linksPhone: '#004E8A',
        linkLi: '#D9D9D9',
        linkA: '#0078D4',
        iconContainer: '#E0E0E0',
        iconA: '#0078D4',
        profile: '#FFFFFF',  // White for subtle contrast
        pulse: '#0078D4',
        cart: '#0078D4',
    },
    landing: {
        bg: '#FFFFFF',  // Clean white (Primary)
        left: '#F5F5F5',
        textLeft: '#3B3B3B',
        textLeftSpan: '#0078D4',
        center: '#F5F5F5',  // Light gray (Primary)
        shopLink: '#0078D4',  // Blue accent
        centerButtons: '#004E8A',  // Darker blue
        centerButtonsLink: '#FFFFFF',
        centerButton2: '#3B3B3B',
        centerButton2Link: '#FFFFFF',
        storeButton: '#0078D4',
        aboutButton: '#004E8A',
        right: '#F5F5F5',
        textRight: '#3B3B3B',
        textRightSpan: '#0078D4',
    },
    offeringSchema: {
        bg: '#F5F5F5',
        bgHover: '#FFFFFF',  // Subtle hover effect
        icon: '#0078D4',
        iconHover: '#004E8A',
        title: '#3B3B3B',
        description: '#FFFFFF',
        styledLink: '#0078D4',
        styledLinkHover: '#004E8A',
    },
    contact: {
        bg: '#FFFFFF',
        title: '#3B3B3B',
        description: '#0078D4',
        socialLinks: '#004E8A',
        socialLink: '#0078D4',
    },
    clientCounter: {
        bg: '#FFFFFF',
        countWrapper: '#F5F5F5',
        number: '#0078D4',
        counter: '#004E8A',
    },
    about: {
        bg: '#FFFFFF',
        aboutSection: '#F5F5F5',
        aboutSectionH1: '#3B3B3B',
        aboutSectionH2: '#0078D4',
        aboutSectionP: '#6D6D6D',  // Soft gray for text
        faq: '#0078D4',
        dropdown: '#F5F5F5',
        dropdownH1: '#3B3B3B',
        answer: '#E0E0E0',
        answerP: '#3B3B3B',
    },
    footer: {
        bg: '#F5F5F5',
        footWrapper: '#F5F5F5',
        section: '#3B3B3B',
        companyTitile: '#0078D4',
        companyDescription: '#6D6D6D',
        sectionTitile: '#3B3B3B',
        styledLink: '#0078D4',
        finalSection: '#E0E0E0',
        finalText: '#3B3B3B',
        finalLink: '#0078D4',
    },
    register: {
        bg: '#F5F5F5',
        left: '#FFFFFF',
        bigCircleGradient: 'rgba(0, 120, 212, 0.1)',
        bigCircleGradient2: 'rgba(0, 78, 138, 0.1)',
        c1: '#0078D4',
        c2: '#004E8A',
        welcome: '#3B3B3B',
        description: '#6D6D6D',
        linktext: '#0078D4',
        styledLink: '#004E8A',
        right: '#E0E0E0',
        container: '#FFFFFF',
        heading: '#3B3B3B',
        input: '#F5F5F5',
        inputBorder: '#D9D9D9',
        inputTextColor: '#3B3B3B',
        inputFocus: '#0078D4',
        registerBtn: '#0078D4',
        registerBtnHover: '#004E8A',
        responseMsg: '#2E7D32',  // Green for success
    },
    customerDash: {
        h3: '#3B3B3B',
        bg: '#FFFFFF',
        sidebar: '#F5F5F5',
        ul: '#D9D9D9',
        li: '#E0E0E0',
        a: '#0078D4',
        svg: '#004E8A',
        span: '#0078D4',
        contentArea: '#F5F5F5',
        CurrentSection: '#0078D4',
        CurrentSectionH1: '#3B3B3B',
        CurrentSectionP: '#6D6D6D',
        boxContainer: '#FFFFFF',
        profileSection: '#F5F5F5',
        userInfo: '#3B3B3B',
        userInfoP: '#6D6D6D',
        form: '#FFFFFF',
        InputGroup: '#F5F5F5',
        label: '#6D6D6D',
        input: '#FFFFFF',
        inputBorder: '#D9D9D9',
        btn: '#0078D4',
        btnHover: '#004E8A',
    },
};



const reducer = (state, action) => {
    switch (action.type) {

        default:
            return state
    }
}

export const colorContext = createContext();
const ColorContextProvider = ({ children }) => {

    const [config, dispatchConfig] = useReducer(reducer, initialState)

    return (
        <colorContext.Provider value={{ config, dispatchConfig }}>
            {children}
        </colorContext.Provider>
    );
};

export default ColorContextProvider;
